text: Nĩ ũndũ ũcio andũ a Kiriathu-Jearimu magĩthiĩ, makĩgĩĩra ithandũkũ rĩa Jehova, makĩrĩambatia. Makĩrĩtwara mũciĩ wa Abinadabu kĩrĩma-igũrũ, na makĩamũra mũriũ Eleazaru aikaragie ithandũkũ rĩa Jehova.7:1 Ithandũkũ rĩa kĩrĩkanĩro rĩaikarire Bethi-Shemeshu nginya rĩrĩa Daudi aarĩtwarire Jerusalemu (2Sam 6:2-3).
